title: [Large-scale] Context-Aware Education Program for Enhancing Clinical Reasoning Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level expertise in medical/life sciences and basic clinical management experience
context.additional_context: Requires a mobile-optimized learning environment for learners with team-based clinical decision-making experience, targeting managerial roles.

learning_goals: Learners can explain systematic reasoning processes considering situational factors in various clinical scenarios with 80% accuracy
Learners can identify error patterns three or more times and propose improvement strategies during team-based clinical problem-solving in digital simulation environments
Learners can structure and reflect on their clinical decision-making processes in three or more stages using stimulated recall techniques in a smartphone-based LMS

resources: Digital templates for team collaboration assessment
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
